definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

pinyin: wen1 shi4 fei4 qi4 chu3 cun2
rong2 mei2 chu3 cun2 ji2 bing4

sentences.english: In such a case, a lapse of memory will represent directly the un-invoiced services.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，失誤的儲存表現爲“不”一開單服務。

sentences.english: The scientists considered putting a small mechanical mixer in the storage tank.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們考慮在儲存罐裏放進小型機械攪拌機。

sentences.english: Each has its advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 每種儲存機制都有優缺點。

sentences.english: All highly flammable bulk storage containers will be kept in the oil storage room.
sentences.chinese: 所有高可燃性散裝貯存容器將被保存在石油儲存室。

sentences.english: Glass containers are non-permeable, but they are breakable and heavy.
sentences.chinese: 金屬容器易腐蝕，且讓儲存在裏面的水變得很難喝。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 膽囊儲存和釋放膽汁，協助脂肪分解爲微小的顆粒。

sentences.english: This means we need a constant flow of blood from donation to storage.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着需要經常性的從捐獻者那裏採血並儲存。

sentences.english: Where do you plan to store the collected tetra pack ?
sentences.chinese: 你打算把那些利樂包儲存到哪裏？

sentences.english: All artifacts in the selected repository or project will be listed.
sentences.chinese: 選中儲存庫或者項目中的所有工件都會列出來。

sentences.english: The prospect of billion-year storage is fascinating and a little terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 數據儲存數十億年的願景令人着迷卻又有點可怕。

sentences.english: The company said that is not white smoke rising from the unit fuel storage pool.
sentences.chinese: 該公司說，白煙並非從機組燃料儲存池中升起。

sentences.english: Permanently store the new scale for future use.
sentences.chinese: 永久儲存新的比額表，供今後使用。

sentences.english: The government has sufficient stockpiles of staples such as wheat and rice.
sentences.chinese: 印度政府的主食儲存，包括小麥和稻米，都很充足。

sentences.english: The Energy Saving Effect Analysis of Energy Saving Exterior Window in Hot Areas;
sentences.chinese: 熱能儲存材料用於儲熱或儲冷，節能效果顯著。

sentences.english: There are many standard formats for saving bitmaps in disk files.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用許多標準格式將點陣圖儲存在磁片檔案中。

sentences.english: Provide 60 sets of files for storages, three axises can change dimension between meter and Inch.
sentences.chinese: 提供60組檔案儲存，三軸座標可公英制切換。

definition: to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
